sections.heading: employees; assignment rights.Sections 79-824 to 79-842 do not provide any certificated employee a right to a specific assignment so long as such certificated employee is assigned to duties for which he or she is qualified by reason of certification, endorsement, or college preparation

79-824 to 79-842 do not provide any certificated employee a right to a specific assignment so long as such certificated employee is assigned to duties for which he or she is qualified by reason of certification, endorsement, or college preparation
sections.text: 79-824 to 79-842 do not provide any certificated employee a right to a specific assignment so long as such certificated employee is assigned to duties for which he or she is qualified by reason of certification, endorsement, or college preparation.
